title: Lowest Carbon Dioxide Emissions from Waste
description: In 2023, Mauritius had one of the lowest carbon dioxide emissions from waste, with only 0.0001 Mt CO2e.

title: Lowest Military Expenditure as a Percentage of Government Spending
description: In 2023, Mauritius allocated only 0.52% of its general government expenditure to military spending, one of the lowest percentages globally.
